The properties of an IoT Central application.

___template.description: The ID of the application template, which is a blueprint that defines the characteristics and behaviors of an application. Optional; if not specified, defaults to a blank blueprint and allows the application to be defined from scratch.

___displayName.description: The display name of the application.
